NewsItem.title: USAi.net President Receives Boston WiFi Award
NewsItem.article:
On May 30, 2007, USAi.net president David Spaulding received a 2006 Special Appreciation Award from the Boston Main Streets.

"David Spaulding, the president of USAi.net, has been partnering closely with Boston Main Streets to bring free wireless to our commercial communities in Roslindale, Washington Gateway, and Jamaica Plain. In addition to extending coverage within these districts, he is also working on providing coverage to Hyde Park, West Roxbury and Chinatown. Dave Spaulding has demonstrated a commitment of both time and resources to improving Boston's neighborhoods, and has demonstrated how effective partnerships can be in impacting our communities.\"

- Name to Be Determined, Boston, MA.

NewsItem.title: USAi Gets Airplay on UPN38 News
NewsItem.article: On February 12, 2007, USAi.net president David Spaulding is seen in a news short called Digital Living, which talked about the Boston Main Streets WiFi project.
